title: the following regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development Act
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 
2000 (Section 254 – Overground Telecommunication Cables) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall be included in the collective citation the 

Planning and Development Regulations 2001 to 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited planning development act 2000 (section 254 - overground telecommunication cables) regulation 2021 (2) regulation shall included collective citation planning development regulation 2001 2021

title: the following regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper
heading: 2. Part 1 of Schedule 12 of the Planning and Development Regulations
text_raw:
2. Part 1 of Schedule 12 of the Planning and Development Regulations 
2001 (S.I. No. 600 of 2001) is amended by the substitution of paragraph (e) with: 

(e) A cable, wire or pipeline (not being a 
cable for conducting electricity for 
domestic or agricultural purposes or a 
drain or waterpipe or an overground 
cable which is part of an electronic 
communications network). 

€25 per 100 metres length or part 
thereof. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 20th August, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [422] 3
text_norm: 2 part 1 schedule 12 planning development regulation 2001 (s.i no 600 2001) amended substitution paragraph (e) (e) cable wire pipeline (not cable conducting electricity domestic agricultural purpose drain waterpipe overground cable part electronic communication network) eur25 per 100 metre length part thereof notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 20th august 2021 422 3

title: the following regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper
heading: 3. Part 2 of Schedule 12 of the Planning and Development Regulations
text_raw:
3. Part 2 of Schedule 12 of the Planning and Development Regulations 
2001 (S.I. No. 600 of 2001) is amended by the insertion after paragraph (e) of: 

“ 

(f) An overground cable which is part of 
an electronic communications network. 

€125 per licence 

” 

GIVEN under my Hand, 

16 August, 2021. 

PETER BURKE, 

Minister of State at the Department of 
Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [422]
